title: The Tata-Marutis of India drive clearance sale offer. But what's the need for it?
description: As the festival season arrives, major automakers are offering significant discounts on cars to address a growing inventory surplus. Tata Motors has reduced prices on popular models by up to Rs 2.05 lakh, while Maruti Suzuki has cut prices on certain small cars by up to Rs 6,500.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
